title: It’s Impossible That My Evil Overlord Is So Cute - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Calm Protagonist   Demon Lord   Dense Protagonist   Heroes   Lack of Common Sense   Loli   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Money Grubber   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Returning from Another World   Romantic Subplot   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transported to Another World   Unique Weapons   Youkai
author: Bat Onigiri   蝙蝠饭团
description:
“Finally, I have defeated the Evil Overlord,

Now I have to participate in the war to save the alien princess.

Then finally, it’ll all be over and I can enjoy a quiet life!”

Xun Shenxing returned to his Sakura Apartment and opened his favorited old computer.

Suddenly, a text appeared.

“Do you want to know the meaning of life? Do you want to live… a real life? Y/N”

“I choose to die.”

This is a story about a landlord. In order to increase tenants and enhance his earnings, he has to solve problems for his tenants (For example, save the world)….>
